attributes.action: Our Air Ambulance services should receive government funding.
attributes.additional_details: It cost around £7 million to keep two Helicopters in the air.  £200 million would 100% fund the UK's Air ambulance service.
attributes.background: Currently, the regional Air Ambulance services are funded buy charitable donations.  Last year, £11.7 billion was sent abroad in foreign aid.  A small percentage of that could help meet the costs. The services should be centralised and funded by a reduction in foreign aid.
